data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Caliente.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 2, Diego Montano Robles signals a Pachuca throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Diego Montano Robles awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Vladimir Lorona (Tijuana de Caliente) gets a yellow card.
Pachuca are coming forward and Victor Davila gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tijuana.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Caliente.
Roberto de la Rosa of Pachuca gets in a strike, but is off target.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pachuca.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 13, Tijuana de Caliente's Fabian Castillo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Caliente. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 17, Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Pachuca are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 19, Tijuana de Caliente drive forward but Jordi Cortizo is judged offside.
Roberto de la Rosa for Pachuca drives towards goal at Estadio Caliente. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Mauro Lainez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Caliente.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 23, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pachuca.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 25, Tijuana de Caliente's Mauro Lainez is whistled for offside at Estadio Caliente.
Oscar Murillo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pachuca.
Tijuana de Caliente pushes forward through Fabian Castillo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Pachuca in Tijuana.
Victor Guzman for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 31, Diego Montano Robles awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 33, Jordi Cortizo (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a yellow card from Diego Montano Robles.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 36, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Victor Guzman.
In Tijuana Pachuca drive forward through Victor Davila. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, Pachuca needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Pablo Guede (Tijuana de Caliente) is making a first substitution, with Bryan Angulo replacing David Barbona.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente, close to Pachuca's area.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Pachuca.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
Free kick in a good position for Pachuca!
In the minute 54, Erick Aguirre for Pachuca drives towards goal at Estadio Caliente. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Tijuana de Caliente drives forward and Fabian Castillo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 57, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Pachuca.
Tijuana de Caliente's Edgar Lopez breaks free at Estadio Caliente. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Jordan Silva is replacing Miguel Barbieri for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Pablo Guede is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Caliente with Jaime Gomez replacing Vladimir Lorona.
In the minute 60, The home team have replaced Fabian Castillo with Jordan Rezabala. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 66, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Victor Sosa is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 68, Tijuana de Caliente's Mauro Lainez is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 69, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roberto de la Rosa is replacing Antonio Figueroa for Pachuca at Estadio Caliente.
Emmanuel Garcia is replacing Victor Sosa for the away team.
Tijuana de Caliente's Jordi Cortizo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Caliente.
Penalty! Diego Montano Robles points to the spot, great chance for Pachuca...
Roberto de la Rosa gives Pachuca a 0-2 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 79, Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 82, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In Tijuana Tijuana de Caliente attack through Edgar Lopez. The finish is off target, however.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Victor Davila with Bryan Gonzalez.
The away team have replaced Victor Guzman with Efrain Orona. This is the fourth substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Pachuca.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a fifth substitution, with Cristian Souza replacing Erick Aguirre.
Luis Leal is on a sub for Edgar Lopez for Tijuana de Caliente.
